mapper.select: select pu.id, u.username, pr.name, pu.count from (select * from purchase_tb where user_id = 1) pu inner join user_tb u on pu.user_id = u.id inner join product_tb pr on pr.id = pu.product_id;
mapper.insert: insert into purchase_tb (user_id, product_id, count, created_at) values (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{count}, now())
